text: Michael Barkann (born April 30, 1960) is an American sportscaster. Barkann was born in Jersey City, New Jersey and grew up in East Brunswick. His jobs include these past and present: *KYW-TV sports reporter *WLVI-TV sports director *New England Patriots preseason play-by-play *CSN Daily News Live Host *Philadelphia Phillies TV Studio Host *Philadelphia Flyers TV Studio Host *Philadelphia 76ers TV Studio Host *Eagles Post Game Live Host *Monday Night Live Host *Spotlight Host *Tennis on USA court reporter *Tennis on HBO court reporter *Being John Daly Host *XFL on UPN play-by-play *College Basketball on CBS sideline reporter *College Football on CBS sideline reporter *Olympics on CBS reporter ==References== Category:Living people Category:1960 births Category:Tennis broadcasters Category:Olympic Games broadcasters Category:Golf broadcasters Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:College football broadcasters Category:National Hockey League broadcasters Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:People from East Brunswick, New Jersey Category:People from Jersey City, New Jersey
title: Michael Barkann
